trends: There have been no other sightings in New Florence
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsat 5:55 pm as i was standing in my yard, i noticed a strange object in the night sky. i called for my neighbors to come out and see a ufo. they immediately came and out and i told them where to look. a bright white, cigar shaped object, traveling nnw to sse at a high altitude and great speed, was visible. it was visible until it dropped past the horizon line. it made no sound, no changes in direction, and no contrails were observed. my neighbors brought a digital camera outside with them and took a photo of it. we all agreed that whatever it was, it was unique to anything we had ever seen before. that's when i learned of the photo.we then downloaded the pic into my computer and opened it. to our surprise, it showed even stranger things.the object was "fishook" shaped, with a black field surrounding it, and some kind of aura outside of that. i then decided to enhance and rotate it for a better perspective view. the results are even stranger still. we were all 3 in awe and amazement as we watched it cross the sky and after an initial "wow, what's that" we watched in silence until it was gone from view. object was brighter than any star and didn't look like any satellite. it is hard to estimate an overall size, but it was between 1\8"-1\4" long to the naked eye, and was at a high altitude. there were no other aircraft visible in the sky, which was totally devoid of cloud cover, with an unlimited range of visibility. all 3 of us are amazed that it hasn't been mentioned on any news, and don't believe we could be the only 3 people who saw it. i have filed reports with ufoseek, nuforc, and komu news which is the local nbc affiliate. please contact me if there is anything you'd like to ask. rev. billy heil p.s. 1st photo (ufo.jpg) is a copy of the original and unaltered, 2nd photo is enhanced, enlarged and rotated for better perspective view. the memory stick with original photo is available for examination as well.
